message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9000.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $7500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $8500. This is the lowest I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $8000, but that's my final offer. I hope we can come to an agreement.

I understand that you're willing to go up to $8000, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell the product for that price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $8250. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $8150. This is my final offer.

I understand that you're willing to meet me halfway again, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $8150. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $8200. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make a small concession and offer $8100. This is my final offer.
